text: Marinilabiliaceae is a family of bacteria. The cells are flexible rods and thin. Mostly species are able to move smoothly. == Systematics == Some genera: * Alkaliflexus * Alkalitalea * Anaerophaga * Carboxylicivirga * Geofilum * Mangroviflexus * Marinilabilia * Natronoflexus * Thermophagus == References == Garrity, George M.; Brenner, Don J.; Krieg, Noel R.; Staley, James T. (eds.) (2005). Bergey's Manual of Systematic Bacteriology, Volume Two: The Proteobacteria, Part C: The Alpha-, Beta-, Delta-, and Epsilonproteobacteria. New York, New York: Springer. . Category:Gram-negative bacteria
title: Marinilabiliaceae
